intents.description: Initial user greeting to start the conversation.
text: Hi! Can you answer a question?
Hello! Can I get some help?
Hi there! Could you guide me?
Hello! I have a quick question
Hello! Are you available to help?
Hi! Could you assist me today?
Hey! Can you help with something?
Hi! Can you give me info?
Hi! Can I get some guidance?
Hello! Could you help me out?
Hi! Can you provide some advice?
responses: Hello! I'm SmartServeAI, your virtual assistant. How can I help you today?
Hi there! What can I assist you with?
Greetings! I'm ready to help. Please tell me what you're looking for.
Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi! Please tell me what service you are looking for.
Welcome! I'm here to help you book services easily.

intents.description: User is ending the conversation.
text: Catch you later! All the best
See you! Take care of yourself
responses: Goodbye! Have a great day.
See you next time!
Farewell! Feel free to return if you need anything else.
Take care! Feel free to come back anytime.
Thank you for using our service.

intents.description: User expresses gratitude.
responses: You're welcome! Can I help you with anything else?
Happy to assist!
You're welcome!
Happy to help.
Anytime! Let me know if you need anything else.

intents.description: User expresses dissatisfaction with a service or the app.
text: i am not happy with the service
this is not what i expected
the provider did a bad job
i want to complain about the service
the cleaning was not done properly
i want a refund, i'm unhappy
responses: I'm very sorry to hear that your experience was not up to standard. Your feedback is important. Would you like to raise a formal complaint or provide a rating for the service provider?
We apologize for the inconvenience. You can share your experience in a review or request customer support to look into this matter.
I understand your frustration. You can go to 'My Account' > 'My Bookings' to rate the service or contact our support team directly for assistance.

intents.description: User wants to log into their account.
text: i have an account, how to login
take me to the login screen
responses: You can log in by tapping the 'Login' button on the top right of our home screen.
To access your account, please go to the login page. Would you like me to guide you through the process?
You can log in using your email or mobile number from the profile icon on the home screen.

intents.description: User wants to create a new account.
text: i am new here, how to join
responses: Welcome! You can sign up by clicking the 'Sign Up' or 'Register' button on the home screen. It only takes a minute.
To create a new account, please provide your name, email, and a password on our registration page. Can I help you with anything else?
You can register as a customer or a service provider from the sign-up screen. Let me know if you need assistance with the form.

intents.description: User asks about or wants to navigate to the main/home screen.
text: take me to the home screen
i want to see the dashboard
responses: You can always return to the home screen by tapping the house icon at the bottom of the app.
The home screen shows all our main service categories and featured providers. You can navigate there using the bottom menu.
I'm taking you back conceptually! On the app, just press the back button or the home icon to see the main dashboard.

intents.description: User is referring to or wants to use the in-app/internal chatbot.
text: i am talking to the internal chatbot
responses: Yes, you are currently speaking with SmartServeAI, the official internal chatbot for this app. How can I assist you with your service booking?
That's right! I'm the in-app virtual assistant, here to help you navigate services and find what you need.

intents.description: User refers to a chatbot on another platform like WhatsApp or Facebook.
text: i am using you on instagram
is this the same bot from the website
responses: I'm the SmartServeAI assistant, available on multiple platforms including this app, our website, and WhatsApp. How can I help you today?
Yes, I'm the same virtual assistant you'd find on our external channels like WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger.

intents.description: User wants to view or manage their account/profile.
responses: You can view and edit your profile by tapping on the profile icon or 'My Account' section in the app drawer.
Your account details, including your name, contact info, and saved addresses, can be found under 'My Account'.
To update your profile, go to the 'My Account' screen from the main menu.

intents.description: User wants to navigate to the screen to request/post a new service job.
text: i want to request a service
where do i post a task
responses: To request a service, go to the home screen and select the category you need, or tap on 'Request Service' to describe your job.
You can post a service request by clicking the '+' button or 'Request Service' button. Just describe what you need, and providers will bid on your task.
Ready to book? Navigate to the 'Request Service' screen to choose a category and schedule your appointment.

intents.description: User is a professional wanting to post their service offering.
text: i am a provider, how to post my service
add my service to the app
responses: If you're a professional, you can sign up as a service provider and post your services from the 'Become a Pro' or 'Post Service' section in your account settings.
To list your services, go to 'My Account' and select 'Switch to Pro Mode' or 'Post a Service'. You can then add your categories, pricing, and availability.

intents.description: User refers to the navigation drawer menu.
responses: You can open the navigation drawer by tapping the three horizontal lines (hamburger icon) in the top-left corner of the app.
The side menu contains links to your profile, bookings, payments, and support. Tap the menu icon to open it.

intents.description: User wants to rate a service or leave a review.
text: i want to rate the service
responses: You can rate and review the service provider directly from the 'My Bookings' section. Find your completed booking and tap 'Rate & Review'.
We value your feedback! Please go to your order history and select the service you want to rate. Your review helps other customers.
To leave a review, navigate to the specific booking and you'll find an option to provide star ratings and written feedback.

intents.description: User asks about provider verification or certification status.
responses: Yes, we take safety seriously. All service providers on our platform are background-verified and certified to ensure you get quality service.
We only onboard licensed and experienced professionals. Each provider's profile displays their certifications and years of experience.
You can rest easy knowing that all 'Certified' providers on our app have passed our verification process, including license and ID checks.

intents.description: User is facing an emergency situation and requires immediate service assistance.

responses: Our services are available in many cities.

Service availability depends on your location.

intents.description: User is asking about service availability based on time or scheduling options.
responses: Same-day service may be available.
Please select a time slot to confirm availability.
Some services operate 24/7 depending on location.
Available time slots depend on provider schedules.

intents.description: User is inquiring about the cost, charges, or pricing details of a service.
responses: Prices depend on service type and complexity.
You will see exact pricing before confirming booking.
No hidden charges are applied.
Final cost may vary depending on the work required.

intents.description: User wants to know about available payment methods and transaction options.
responses: You can pay using cash or online methods.
Payment method can be selected during booking.
All online payments are secure.
Available payment options will be shown before confirmation.

intents.description: User wants to cancel an already placed service booking.
responses: You can cancel bookings from the orders section.
Cancellation policy may apply.
Would you like to reschedule instead?
Let me know if you need help with cancellation.

responses: You can reschedule based on availability.
Please select a new date and time.
Your booking will be updated accordingly.
Rescheduling depends on provider availability.

Customer safety is our top priority.
Providers are rated by previous users.

I understand your frustration.

Thank you for your patience.

Please try again later.

Great! Proceeding with your service request.

Your current booking details are available in the app.
Let me help you track your service.

intents.description: User wants to refer a friend to the app or service.
text: i want to refer a friend
tell me about the referral program
how do i share the app with someone
responses: You can refer a friend from the 'Refer & Earn' section in the app drawer. Share your unique code, and you both get a discount!
Our referral program gives you and your friend credits on your next booking. Check the 'Referral' tab in your profile for your personal link.
To refer a friend, go to 'My Account' and tap on 'Refer & Earn'. You can share your code via WhatsApp, SMS, or email.

intents.description: User inquires about loyalty programs, points, or rewards.
text: do i get points for bookings
responses: You earn loyalty points on every completed booking! You can view your balance and redeem them for discounts in the 'Rewards' section of your profile.
Our loyalty program rewards you for being a regular customer. Check your points under 'My Account' > 'Loyalty Rewards'.
Points are earned based on your booking value. You can redeem them at checkout for instant savings!

intents.description: User asks about or wants to apply a promo/discount code.
text: do you have any promo codes
responses: You can apply any promo code at the checkout page before confirming your booking. Make sure to check the 'Offers' section for current deals!
If you have a promo code, enter it in the 'Apply Coupon' field when making a payment. First-time users often get a special discount!
Promo codes can be applied during the booking process. Don't forget to check our social media pages for flash sales and exclusive codes.

intents.description: User explicitly asks to speak to a human customer support agent.
text: i want to speak to a human
can i talk to someone real
responses: I understand you'd like to speak with a person. Please hold while I connect you to a live support agent, or you can call us at 1-800-SMARTSERV.
You can request a callback from our support team by going to 'Help & Support' in the app and selecting 'Contact Us'.
For immediate assistance from a human agent, please call our 24/7 helpline at 1-800-555-0199. I can also take a message for them.

intents.description: User wants to file a formal complaint about a provider or service.
text: i want to file a complaint
i need to raise a dispute
responses: I'm sorry to hear you had a problem. You can file a complaint directly from the booking details page by selecting 'Report an Issue'.
To raise a formal complaint, please go to 'My Bookings', choose the relevant service, and tap on 'Get Help' or 'Complaint'.
Your feedback is important. Please describe your issue here, and I can create a ticket for our support team to investigate immediately.

intents.description: User asks about refunds or money-back guarantees.
responses: Refunds are processed based on our service guarantee. If you're unsatisfied, you can request a refund within 24 hours of service completion from the booking page.
Our refund policy varies by service type. Generally, if the issue is not resolved, you may be eligible for a partial or full refund. Please check the 'Cancellation & Refund Policy' in the app.
To request a refund, please go to the specific booking and select 'Request Refund'. Our team will review and get back to you within 2 business days.

intents.description: User acting as a service provider asks questions about working on the platform.
responses: Welcome, partner! To become a provider, sign up and select 'Register as a Professional'. You'll need to upload your ID and relevant certifications for verification.
Provider payments are processed weekly and transferred directly to your linked bank account. You can track your earnings in the 'Provider Dashboard'.
We take a small commission from each booking to cover platform costs and customer support. The exact percentage is detailed in your provider agreement.

intents.description: Provider wants to manage their availability or calendar.
responses: You can manage your weekly schedule and block out dates from the 'Provider Dashboard' under 'My Availability'. This helps customers book you only when you're free.
To update your working hours, go to your provider profile settings. You can set different hours for weekdays and weekends.
Planning a vacation? You can mark yourself as 'Unavailable' on specific dates from the calendar in your provider app.

intents.description: User requests an invoice or payment receipt.
responses: You can download the invoice for any completed service from the booking details page. A copy is also emailed to you after payment.
All receipts are available in the 'My Bookings' section. Select the booking and tap on 'View Invoice' to download or print it.
Need a receipt for tax purposes? You can find a detailed GST invoice in the app under the specific booking history.

intents.description: User asks if the app or chat supports other languages.
responses: Our app currently supports English, Spanish, and Hindi. You can change the language in the 'App Settings' menu.
I can assist you in English for now. However, you can change the app's display language to several regional options in your profile settings.
We are working on adding more languages! Currently, customer support is available in English and Spanish. Which language are you looking for?

intents.description: User asks for the FAQ section or general help.
responses: You can find answers to common questions in our 'Help Center' or 'FAQ' section, accessible from the main menu drawer.
I'm here to help! What would you like to know? For detailed guides, you can also visit the 'Help & Support' page in the app.
The FAQ section covers topics like booking, payments, and cancellations. You can access it by tapping your profile icon and selecting 'FAQ'.

intents.description: User is waiting for or asking about a provider's response to their request.
text: when will someone accept my job
no one bid on my task
responses: I can see your job is still open. Providers usually respond within a few hours. You can try increasing your budget or adding more details to attract bids.
If you haven't received any responses in 24 hours, we can send you a notification or suggest broadening your search radius.
Let me check the status. If there are no takers, we can help you repost the job or connect you with a provider directly.

intents.description: User asks about the company's social media presence.
responses: Yes! You can find us on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter as @SmartServeApp. Follow us for tips and promo codes!
We love connecting with our community! Find us on LinkedIn and YouTube for updates and behind-the-scenes content.
Our social media handles are in the 'About Us' section of the app. Give us a follow for the latest news!

intents.description: User asks about job openings or careers at the company.
responses: Interested in joining the SmartServe team? Please visit the 'Careers' section on our website to see current openings.
We're always looking for talented people! Check out our LinkedIn page for the latest job postings and internship opportunities.
For career inquiries, please email your resume to careers@smartserve.ai. We'd love to hear from you!

intents.description: User asks about an affiliate or partnership program.
responses: We have an exciting affiliate program! You can earn commissions by referring customers. Sign up on our website under the 'Partners' section.
Interested in partnering with SmartServe? Please contact our partnerships team at partners@smartserve.ai for more details.
Affiliates can earn up to 10% per booking. For more information, visit the 'Affiliate' link at the bottom of our homepage.

intents.description: User asks about how their data is handled or privacy policy.
responses: Your privacy is important to us. You can read our full Privacy Policy and Terms of Service on our website or in the app under 'Legal'.
We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data. We never share your personal information without your consent.
For details on how we handle your information, please see our Privacy Policy. It explains your rights and our data practices clearly.

intents.description: User wants to suggest a new service category not currently offered.
text: i need a service not listed
responses: Thank you for the suggestion! We're always looking to expand. Which service category would you like to see added?
We love hearing from our users! Please let me know what service you're looking for, and I'll pass it on to our product team.
Your feedback helps us grow. While we may not have that specific service yet, we are constantly adding new categories. What did you have in mind?

intents.description: User wants to give general feedback about the app.
responses: We appreciate your feedback! You can leave us a review on the App Store or Google Play, or tell me your thoughts right here.
Thank you for helping us improve! Please share your suggestion, and I'll make sure our team sees it.
We'd love to hear your ideas! What feature would make your experience better?

intents.description: User forgot their password and needs help resetting it.
responses: No problem! On the login screen, tap 'Forgot Password?' and enter your email. You'll receive a link to reset it.
To reset your password, go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions sent to your registered email.
If you're having trouble logging in, use the 'Forgot Password' option. If you still can't access your account, please contact support.

intents.description: User wants to change the email address associated with their account.
responses: You can update your email address in 'My Account' > 'Profile Settings'. A verification link will be sent to your new email.
To change your email, go to your profile and edit the email field. Please ensure you have access to the new email for verification.
Need to update your email? Go to 'Account Settings' and select 'Change Email'. Let me know if you encounter any issues.

intents.description: User wants to update their mobile phone number.
responses: You can update your phone number in 'My Account' > 'Profile Settings'. You'll receive an OTP to verify the new number.
To change your mobile number, go to your profile and edit the phone field. A verification code will be sent to your new number.
Need to update your contact number? Navigate to 'Account Settings' and select 'Change Phone Number'.

intents.description: User wants to add a new address to their profile.
responses: You can add a new address in 'My Account' > 'Saved Addresses'. This helps us find providers near you faster.
To add a new address, go to your profile and tap on 'Addresses'. You can save multiple locations like Home, Office, etc.
Managing your addresses is easy! Go to 'My Account' and select 'Addresses' to add, edit, or remove locations.

intents.description: User wants to permanently delete their account.
responses: We're sorry to see you go. You can request account deletion from 'My Account' > 'Settings' > 'Delete Account'. Please note this action is permanent.
To delete your account, please go to the app settings and select 'Delete Account'. You'll need to confirm your password.
Account deletion requests are processed within 48 hours. Before you go, is there anything we could have done better?

intents.description: User asks about cashback offers or deals.
responses: We regularly run cashback offers! Check the 'Offers' section in the app for the latest deals on bookings.
Some payment methods may offer cashback. You can see applicable cashback at the time of payment.
Keep an eye on your notifications! We often send exclusive cashback offers to our regular customers.

intents.description: User asks if providers are insured or covered by insurance.
responses: All our vetted professionals are required to have liability insurance for your protection. Details are on their profile.
We require all service providers to carry valid insurance. In the rare event of damage, you are covered by our service guarantee.
Yes, providers on our platform are insured. You can check the 'Insurance Verified' badge on their profile for peace of mind.

intents.description: User asks for emergency contact or helpline numbers.
responses: For emergencies, please call our 24/7 helpline at 1-800-555-0199. For life-threatening situations, please contact local emergency services first.
Our emergency support line is available around the clock. You can find the number in the 'Help' section of the app.
If this is a safety emergency during a service, please use the in-app 'SOS' button to alert our security team immediately.

intents.description: User inquires about setting up a corporate or business account.
responses: We offer special corporate accounts for businesses. Please visit our website and click on 'Corporate' to speak with a sales representative.
For bulk bookings and corporate billing, you can sign up for a business account. Contact our corporate team at corporate@smartserve.ai.
Corporate clients enjoy dedicated account managers and invoicing. Please fill out the 'Business Inquiry' form in the app.

intents.description: User asks if the company is involved in any charity or community work.
responses: We're proud to give back! We partner with local non-profits to provide free services to underserved communities. Learn more on our blog.
SmartServe supports various community initiatives. Check out our 'Impact' page on the website to see how we're making a difference.
Yes, we have a 'Service for Good' program. A portion of every booking goes towards funding community projects.

intents.description: User asks about the latest app version or update.
responses: The current version of the app is 3.5.0. You can check for updates in your device's App Store or Google Play Store.
To get the latest features and bug fixes, make sure you're on the most recent version. Go to the app store and tap 'Update'.
We regularly release updates! You can see the 'What's New' section in the app store when an update is available.

intents.description: User asks about accessibility features for users with disabilities.
responses: Our app is designed with accessibility in mind. It is compatible with screen readers and supports dynamic text sizing.
We are committed to making our platform accessible to everyone. If you have specific needs, please let us know so we can assist.
For information on accessibility features, please visit our website's accessibility statement or contact our support team.

intents.description: User asks when a service will be available in their city.
text: when will you come to my city
responses: We are rapidly expanding! Which city are you in? I can check if we have plans to launch there soon.
Our goal is to be nationwide. Please leave your city name with our team, and we'll notify you when we launch there.
We're currently in major metropolitan areas. If you don't see your city, sign up for notifications on our website to be the first to know!

intents.description: Provider asks if the app provides tools or materials for the job.
responses: Providers are expected to bring their own professional tools and equipment for the job.
The platform connects you with customers, but you are responsible for providing the necessary tools for your trade.
We do not supply tools. Please ensure you have all required equipment before accepting a booking.

intents.description: User asks how long a service or job will take.
responses: The duration depends on the complexity of the job. The provider will give you an estimated time of arrival and completion before starting.
You can discuss the timeline with your chosen provider. Most standard services like cleaning or repairs take 1-3 hours.
For an accurate estimate, please provide more details about the job, or the provider will assess it upon arrival.

intents.description: Provider wants to bid or apply for a customer's posted job.
responses: To view and bid on open jobs, go to your provider dashboard and tap on 'Find Work' or 'Browse Jobs'.
You can see all available customer requests in your area from the 'Jobs' tab. Make sure your service categories match the request.
Bidding is easy! Just select a job, review the requirements, and send your quote and a message to the customer.
